ygData.msgSnippet: A shuttle flies between Earth and the moon.  In it a bulky grey bot sits at the controls with an angry look on his face.  He looks over at a vile of green

A shuttle flies between Earth and the moon.  In it a bulky grey bot 
sits at the controls with an angry look on his face.  He looks over at 
a vile of green stuff.  All of a sudden he has a flashback of an 
organic hand sticking out of a green foggish gas as the flesh falls 
off the hand leaving the bone exposed.  Then he sees a bot that looks 
exactly like him, except a Predicon insignia replaces the Maximal one. 
appear.

Copy Bot:  Hello traitor.  Lol.  Still chasing after me.  Trying to 
blame your sins on your own brother.

He gets a frightened look.

Pilot:  ME YOU DID IT!

CB: What did you expect I'm a Predicon.  But a Maximal refusing to 
warn inicent bystanders even though he had the information.

P:  I THOUGHT YOU WERE MOCKING ME!  IF IT WAS GOING TO HAPPEN YOU 
SHOULDN'T HAVE TOLD ME!

CB:  Face it your a Turntail.

He pauses.

P:  So be it.  May that be my name until the day I kill you.

CB:  You're just like me.  Lol.

Turntail:  I'M NOT LIKE YOU!

He slams his fist on the console and the plan crashes towards Africa. 
When it lands turntail takes a Rhino Beastmode.
